Article.ArticleTitle: Workforce research priorities for resilience to future health shocks-and the workforce crisis.

Abstract.AbstractText: More and better research is needed now to develop an evidence base that informs policy to maximise workforce effectiveness and wellbeing to respond to both the next health shock and the ongoing shock of the workforce crisis, write Kieran Walshe and colleagues
